extDescription.message: Your bookmarks, safe on GitHub — per-file storage, three-way merge sync, works on Chrome & Firefox. No server needed.

popup_conflictDescription.message: Both local and remote bookmarks were modified. Choose a resolution:

options_profileSwitchConfirm.message: Switch to "$1"? Your bookmarks will be replaced with that profile's bookmarks.

options_profileDeleteConfirm.message: Delete profile "$1"? This cannot be undone.

options_tokenHint.message: Requires the repo scope. Create token

options_filePathHint.message: Folder where bookmark files will be stored.

options_browseFolderNotConfigured.message: Please configure token, owner, and repo first

options_filePathChangeHint.message: On the next sync a conflict may occur. Use "GitHub → Local" to adopt the remote state.

options_githubReposDesc.message: Create a folder with bookmarks to all your GitHub repositories (public and private).

options_syncIntervalHint.message: How often to check for remote changes.

options_debounceDelayHint.message: Wait time before syncing after bookmark changes.

options_generatedFilesDesc.message: Files created in the repo during sync. Choose Off, Manual, or Auto per file.

options_generateBookmarksHtmlDesc.message: Netscape format for browser import (Chrome, Firefox).

options_generateFeedXmlDesc.message: RSS 2.0 feed — subscribe in any RSS reader or use for automations.

options_generateDashyYmlDesc.message: Dashy dashboard config — import as sections into your conf.yml.

options_settingsSyncDesc.message: Encrypted backup of extension settings in the repo. Same password on every device.

options_settingsSyncPasswordHint.message: Set once per device. Must be the same on all devices.

options_settingsSyncActive.message: Settings sync active — settings will be pushed on next sync.

options_settingsSyncGlobalWriteHint.message: Recommended OFF. If enabled, this client can overwrite global settings for all devices.

options_settingsSyncImportGlobalConfirm.message: Apply the global settings file now? This will overwrite current local settings on this device.

options_settingsSyncImportReloadConfirm.message: Settings were imported. Reload now to apply them everywhere?

options_settingsRegistryActionPasswordPr.message: Enter password for this settings action

options_settingsRegistrySyncSuccess.message: Current settings synced to selected profile

options_settingsRegistryCreateNameRequir.message: Please enter a name for the new setting

options_resetDescription.message: Delete all profiles, tokens, and settings. Your browser bookmarks will not be affected.

options_resetConfirm.message: Are you sure? This cannot be undone. All profiles and settings will be permanently deleted.

options_tokenValidRepoNotFound.message: Token valid ($1), but repository "$2" not found.

options_tokenValidSpecifyRepo.message: Token valid! User: $1. Please specify a repository.

options_onboardingCreateFolder.message: The folder $1 does not exist yet. Create it with the base structure (toolbar, other)?

options_onboardingPullNow.message: Bookmarks found in the repository. Pull them to this browser now?

options_onboardingWizardStepWelcomeText.message: This wizard guides you through repository setup, token configuration, connection test, and first sync.

options_onboardingWizardStepRepoText.message: Fill repository owner, repository name, branch, and base path.

options_onboardingWizardStepTokenText.message: Add a GitHub token with repo scope. Keep it private.

options_onboardingWizardStepValidateText.message: Run the test action to verify token, repository, and path access.

options_onboardingWizardStepSyncTextEmpt.message: Path is empty. Create the initial folder structure to start syncing.

options_onboardingWizardStepSyncTextExis.message: Bookmarks already exist in the repository. Pull them to this browser now.

options_onboardingWizardStepFinishText.message: Setup is complete. You can continue with regular sync settings.

options_onboardingWizardNeedConnection.message: Please run the connection test first.

options_onboardingWizardNeedAction.message: Please complete the first sync action first.

options_onboardingWizardDismissed.message: Wizard dismissed. You can restart it anytime.

options_onboardingWizardStepTokenHelpTex.message: Open GitHub token settings and create a Personal Access Token with repo scope.

options_onboardingWizardTokenHelpText.message: Create a GitHub Personal Access Token with repo scope in your GitHub settings.

options_onboardingWizardStepHasTokenTitl.message: Do you already have a token?

options_onboardingWizardStepHasTokenText.message: If not, create one first, then continue with token input.

options_onboardingWizardHasTokenLabel.message: Do you already have a token?

options_onboardingWizardStepRepoDecision.message: Choose auto-create repository or manual existing repository flow.

options_onboardingWizardTokenValidated.message: Token is valid and has required scope.

options_onboardingWizardRepoRequired.message: Please enter repository owner and name.

options_onboardingWizardRepoCreateFailed.message: Repository could not be created with the current token/permissions.

options_onboardingWizardRepoOwnerMismatc.message: Auto-create supports only your own user repositories. Set owner to $1.

options_onboardingWizardRepoUserOnlyHint.message: For organization or different-owner repositories, switch to manual existing repository mode.

options_onboardingWizardRepoCreatePermis.message: This token cannot create repositories. Check repo scope and account permissions.

api_invalidToken.message: Invalid token. Please check your Personal Access Token.

api_rateLimitExceeded.message: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment.

api_accessDenied.message: Access denied. Please check your token permissions.

api_conflict.message: Conflict: The file was modified in the meantime.

sync_notConfigured.message: Extension not configured. Please open settings.

sync_conflictRemoteModified.message: Conflict detected: Remote was also modified.

sync_conflictFileModified.message: Conflict: The file was modified in the meantime.

sync_alreadyUpToDate.message: Bookmarks are already up to date.

sync_conflictBothModified.message: Conflict: Both local and remote bookmarks were modified. Please choose Push or Pull.

options_mobileAppDesc.message: View your bookmarks on the go. GitSyncMarks-Mobile (iOS + Android) syncs from your GitHub repo — read-only companion.

options_mobileAppStores.message: F-Droid and Google Play coming soon.

options_debugLogDesc.message: Enable to record sync diagnostics (diffs, merge decisions, conflicts, commit hashes at key points). Use when troubleshooting sync issues. Export and share the log for support.

options_debugLogExportEmpty.message: Log is empty. Enable debug log and run a sync first.

help_gettingStartedIntro.message: Create a GitHub repository for your bookmarks, then create a Personal Access Token (PAT) with the repo scope. In the GitHub tab, enter token, repository owner, name, branch (usually main), and the folder path (default: bookmarks). Click Test Connection to verify.

help_onboarding.message: If the folder is empty, you can create the base structure (toolbar, other). If bookmarks already exist in the repo, you can pull them into this browser.

help_profilesIntro.message: Each profile has its own bookmark set and GitHub repo config. Use profiles for work/personal or different devices.

help_profilesAddDesc.message: Select a profile in the dropdown, then Add (new profile), Rename, or Delete. Up to 10 profiles. Deleting removes the selected profile.

help_profilesSwitchDesc.message: Select another profile to switch. Your current bookmarks are saved and pushed to the current profile's repo before switching. The target profile's bookmarks replace the local ones. Use Switch without confirmation to skip the confirm dialog.

help_profilesNote.message: Profiles work reliably. With multiple profiles, sync conflicts can occasionally occur — trying Push or Pull 2–3 times usually resolves them. This feature is still evolving. If you encounter reproducible bugs, please open an issue on GitHub.

help_githubReposDesc.message: Optional: Create a folder with bookmarks to all your GitHub repositories (public and private). Choose the position (toolbar, other). The folder is synced like normal bookmarks; use Update GitHub Repos to refresh the list.

help_popupProfileDesc.message: Switch profiles directly from the popup header.

help_popupSyncNowDesc.message: Full three-way merge sync: local and remote changes are merged automatically when possible.

help_popupPushDesc.message: Upload local bookmarks to GitHub (overwrites remote changes).

help_autoSyncDesc.message: When enabled, syncs automatically when you add, edit, or remove bookmarks. A debounce delay waits for rapid changes to finish before syncing.

help_syncProfilesDesc.message: Real-time (1 min), Frequent (5 min), Normal (15 min), or Power save (60 min). Custom lets you set interval and debounce manually.

help_syncStartupDesc.message: Optional: sync when the browser starts or when you return to the browser window (with cooldown).

help_generatedFilesDesc.message: README.md, bookmarks.html, feed.xml, and dashy-conf.yml can be created during sync. Choose Off, Manual, or Auto per file in the Files tab.

help_settingsSyncDesc.message: When enabled, extension settings (profiles, tokens, preferences) are encrypted and stored in the repo. Choose Global (shared settings.enc for all devices) or Individual (device-specific settings-{id}.enc). In individual mode you can import settings from other devices. The password is stored locally per device and must be the same on all devices sharing the repo.

help_notificationsDesc.message: Choose when to show sync notifications: All (success and failure), Errors only, or Off.

help_backupBookmarksDesc.message: Export all browser bookmarks as JSON. Import replaces all bookmarks in the active profile with the file contents.

help_backupSettingsDesc.message: Export as plain .json or password-encrypted .enc. Import replaces all settings (all profiles); the page reloads afterwards.

help_conflictDesc.message: When both local and remote bookmarks changed, the popup shows a conflict. Choose Push (local wins, overwrite remote) or Pull (remote wins, overwrite local). There is no automatic merge for conflicts.

help_debugLogDesc.message: Enable in the Sync tab to record detailed sync diagnostics — diffs, merge decisions, and commit hashes. Export the log to share for troubleshooting.

help_backupBookmarksDesc2.message: Export bookmarks (JSON), Dashy config (YAML), or settings (plain JSON / encrypted .enc). Import bookmarks or settings — encrypted files are decrypted with your password. Bookmark import replaces all local bookmarks; settings import replaces all profiles and reloads the page.

help_themeCycleDesc.message: Click the button in the header to cycle: Auto (system) → Dark → Light → Auto. The icon shows the current mode. Works in options and popup.

help_autoSaveDesc.message: All settings save automatically when you change them — there are no Save buttons. Changes take effect immediately.

help_whySlowTitle.message: Why does sync sometimes take long?

help_whySlowIntro.message: GitSyncMarks uses GitHub's Git Data API for atomic commits. Each changed or new bookmark file requires an API call. With many changes, this adds up.

help_whyAtomic.message: All changes are written in a single atomic commit: either everything succeeds or nothing does. This prevents partial or corrupted state if the sync is interrupted. One commit instead of many also avoids hitting API rate limits and keeps the Git history clean.

help_voteBacklogDesc.message: Vote on which backlog feature we tackle next. Your voice shapes the roadmap.

options_backupIntro.message: Export or import bookmarks as JSON; settings as JSON or password-encrypted .enc.

options_exportDashyDesc.message: Export bookmarks as Dashy dashboard sections (YAML).

options_exportSettingsDesc.message: GitHub connection and sync settings (incl. profiles).

options_importBookmarksWarning.message: Replaces all bookmarks in the active profile. Cannot be undone.

options_importSettingsWarning.message: Replaces all settings (all profiles). Page reloads afterwards.

options_exportPasswordPrompt.message: Enter a password to encrypt the settings file.

options_importPasswordPrompt.message: Enter the password to decrypt the settings file.

options_automationIntro.message: Add bookmarks directly in your repository. The extension picks them up on the next sync and normalizes filenames automatically.

options_automationGithubActionParams.message: folder = root; path = optional subfolder; base-path if File Path ≠ bookmarks

options_automationCreateFileDesc.message: Add a new JSON file in bookmarks/toolbar/ or bookmarks/other/ (or a subfolder). Use your extension's File Path if different.

options_automationParamBasePath.message: Base folder in repo (default bookmarks; must match File Path setting)

options_exportImportDesc.message: Export or import bookmarks and extension settings.

contextMenu_notifNoFavicon.message: No favicon available for this page
